Description: WE ARE FLORIDA'S OLDEST VINTAGE GUITAR SHOP ! 1976 Rickenbacker 480 Guitar quite cool & ultra rare in a stunning color ! Beautiful example of this solid maple body guitar in its best & rarest color choice, this Autumnglo finish, its 2 Hi-Gain pickups ring like no hollow body ever does, its Black pickgard & truss rod cover finish it off quite nicely, its bound/dot inlaid fingerboard on its 1 piece maple neck feel great, designed to match its best selling sibling, the 4001 bass, the guitar version never really had a lot of public play time until in recent years, exceptionally clean & all original & comes w/what appears to be an original budget line hard case. We stock over 200 of the best vintage & collectible guitars in the USA as well as some very unusual classic & modern sports cars. Please click the "See Other Items" icon above to see all we have available. We also buy cool guitars & amps every day as well as any unusual cars…weather it’s 1 item or a whole collection.
Title: 1976 Rickenbacker 480 Solid Body Guitar rare sibling to the infamous 4001 Bass.
